entries.npc_msn_01_greeting_01: Yes? You know this isn't exactly the BEST time to interrupt me.
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_greeting_02: You don't look busy to me.
entries.npc_msn_01_busy_01: What would you know about it? Tell me what you want or get out of here!
entries.npc_msn_01_work_02: Hmmm.... Now that I think about it, you might be able to help me out.
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_getmission_01: I'm ready for some action. What do you have for me?
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_getmission_02: I would be happy to help you out. What can I do?
entries.npc_msn_01_work_01: That's nothing new. Your kind is always looking for odd jobs, aren't they?
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_getmission_03: Can we skip the hassle and talk about the job, please?
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_getmission_04: I'm not looking for trouble, just a job.
entries.npc_msn_01_presp_getmission_05: I want a job. Don't you have something that you need done?
entries.npc_msn_01_greeting_onmission: I don't want to talk again until you've finished what I've asked you to do.
entries.npc_msn_01_friend_greeting_onmission: Aren't you supposed to be helping my friend, here?
entries.npc_msn_01_friend_work_01: You should speak to my friend. There's work to be done, but it's far too dangerous for me!
entries.npc_msn_01_greeting_onothermission: You need to finish all of your other tasks before we can talk.
entries.npc_msn_01_decline: Well fine. I didn't want your help anyways.
